#load libraries
```{r}
library("dplyr")
library("bigrquery")
library("DBI")
library("pheatmap")
library("RColorBrewer")
library("Rmisc")
library("stats")
library("rstatix")
library("ggplot2")
```

#load data
```{r}
conc = read.csv("~/TSCA/CRA/CRA_Prioritization/Data/EPA_RSLs/NWmaterial_conc.csv")
rsls = read.csv("~/TSCA/CRA/CRA_Prioritization/Data/EPA_RSLs/EPA_soil_RSLs_R.csv")
```


#combine dfs, find which rows were not matched by the CAS no, and re-add those files to the merged_df to do those by hand in excel
```{r}
merged_df = merge(conc, rsls, by="CAS")

dropped_cas = anti_join(conc, merged_df, by="CAS")

write.csv(merged_df, "~/TSCA/CRA/CRA_Prioritization/Output/NW_RSLs/merged_df.csv")

write.csv(dropped_cas, "~/TSCA/CRA/CRA_Prioritization/Output/NW_RSLs/dropped_cas.csv")
```
